item.title: Run YOLO v5 on Jetson nano step by step tutorial
item.description: What’s the goal? ðŸ”—To run YOLOv5 on jetson developer kit to achieve real-time object detection. What you need: ðŸ”— A Jetson nano (If you are using other Jetson developer kit from Nvidia, I am sure you can take this as reference as well.) A SD card and power suply which meets the needs. Another computer or laptop with internet connection and built-in SD card slot or an adapter. A monitor with HDMI port, a USB mouse and a USB keyboard.
